statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT product_id, purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, purchase_quantity FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(purchase_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_quantity > 10 AND purchase_price < 50;
SELECT AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price, MAX(purchase_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE quantity_purchased >= 5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_purchased) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_history GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 AND price < 20 ORDER BY product_id DESC;

SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM products p INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, SUM(ph.quantity_purchased) AS total_quantity_purchased FROM products p LEFT JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_purchased DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_purchase_history;
SELECT purchase_quantity, purchase_price, purchase_date FROM product_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM product_inventory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT analysis_id, product_id, sale_quantity FROM sales_analysis WHERE sale_quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_analysis WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product_inventory WHERE product_category='Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM product_inventory WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_analysis WHERE sale_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_quantity FROM product_purchase_history WHERE purchase_quantity < 5 ORDER BY purchase_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shirt%' ORDER BY product_category, product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM sales WHERE amount >= 100.00;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, SUM(s.amount) as total_sales FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT c.name as customer_name, SUM(s.amount) as total_amount_spent FROM customers c INNER JOIN sales s ON c.id = s.customer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;
SELECT p.name, pr.purchase_date, pr.quantity, s.amount FROM products p INNER JOIN purchases pr ON p.id = pr.product_id INNER JOIN sales s ON pr.id = s.purchase_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Supplier WHERE LENGTH(supplier_address) > 20;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
